title: How to Draw Chanel Logo on a T Shirt

steps.headline: Buy a textile acrylic paint black color
Find a proportional divider with a soft charcoal pencil.
Take a ruler.
steps.description: Obtain some white paper, A4 size.

steps.headline: Draw according the scheme shown at the picture.
steps.description: The bigger radius is 10 cm (3.9 in), the small one is 7 cm (2.8 in). You can scale it if you want the logo smaller or bigger.

steps.headline: After you draw the logo on the paper, prepare the white t-shirt.
steps.description: Put a wide flat book inside of it; this will make it easier to draw on the t-shirt.

steps.headline: Place a paper with your logo drawing on the book cover so that you can see it through the white cotton.
steps.description: Draw the logo on the t-shirt with a charcoal pencil.

steps.headline: Paint the logo with a brush and black acrylic paint.
Iron your t-shirt, the back of cloth for a three minutes to set the paint.
steps.description: Your new handmade Chanel logo t-shirt is ready!

text: Buy a white simple t-shirt.  Buy a textile acrylic paint black color  Buy a small paintbrush.  Find a proportional divider with a soft charcoal pencil.  Take a ruler. Obtain some white paper, A4 size. Draw according the scheme shown at the picture. The bigger radius is 10 cm (3.9 in), the small one is 7 cm (2.8 in). You can scale it if you want the logo smaller or bigger. After you draw the logo on the paper, prepare the white t-shirt. Put a wide flat book inside of it; this will make it easier to draw on the t-shirt. Place a paper with your logo drawing on the book cover so that you can see it through the white cotton. Draw the logo on the t-shirt with a charcoal pencil. Paint the logo with a brush and black acrylic paint. Apply two coats. Dry the picture for 10 minutes.  Iron your t-shirt, the back of cloth for a three minutes to set the paint. Your new handmade Chanel logo t-shirt is ready!
